# ELFIN Data Analysis

This document analyzes ELFIN satellite data to find continuous time ranges and prepare for conjunction analysis with DMSP.

## Loading ELFIN Position Data

Interpolate ELFIN position data to 1 second resolution

Overplot the fluxes

```{julia}
trange = ["2021-08-07", "2021-08-08"] # event in @zouKeyRoleMagnetic2024 
zoom_tr1 = [DateTime("2021-08-07T00:40"), DateTime("2021-08-07T00:46")]
zoom_tr2 = [DateTime("2021-08-07T02:12"), DateTime("2021-08-07T02:18")]
f = Figure()
r = elx_flux.prec ./ elx_flux.perp
r.metadata[:colorrange] = (1e-2, 1)
elx_flux.perp.metadata[:colorrange] = (1e2, 1e6)
tvars = [elx_flux.perp, r]
tplot(f[1, 1], tvars, zoom_tr1...)
tplot(f[1, 2], tvars, zoom_tr2...)
f
```
